snippet.textDisplay: Tropospheric water vapor is the cause of earth's greenhouse effect at over 99% to low estimate of 97%.  Global warming was being reported in the mid 1990s at 1.1°C.   It is now 2022 and global warming is still being reported at 1.1°C.   A reasonable estimate for temperature forcing in earth's atmosphere from human emissions of the weak greenhouse gas carbon dioxide is 1/100°C.  Even if the concentration of carbon dioxide and methane in earth's atmosphere were cut in half or doubled it would cause less than 0.1°C in change global temperatures.  The United Nations International Panel on Climate Change reports are very clear and transparent they took their air samples outside the troposphere where earth's greenhouse effect takes place and way into the stratosphere where the strong greenhouse gas water vapor is near zero.  This makes the IPCC reports of no particular value for the discussion of global warming.
snippet.textOriginal: Tropospheric water vapor is the cause of earth's greenhouse effect at over 99% to low estimate of 97%.  Global warming was being reported in the mid 1990s at 1.1°C.   It is now 2022 and global warming is still being reported at 1.1°C.   A reasonable estimate for temperature forcing in earth's atmosphere from human emissions of the weak greenhouse gas carbon dioxide is 1/100°C.  Even if the concentration of carbon dioxide and methane in earth's atmosphere were cut in half or doubled it would cause less than 0.1°C in change global temperatures.  The United Nations International Panel on Climate Change reports are very clear and transparent they took their air samples outside the troposphere where earth's greenhouse effect takes place and way into the stratosphere where the strong greenhouse gas water vapor is near zero.  This makes the IPCC reports of no particular value for the discussion of global warming.

snippet.textDisplay: Current hypothesis is that global warming is due to accumulation of greenhouse gases, that let sun heat in but keep the heat on the earth, like one way valve, in the atmosphere. Scientists agreed that there is such a thing as one-way valve in the air. Anyway, on the basis of this hypothesis, the temperature on the earth goes down only after the amount of greenhouse gases go down, meaning until carbon neural achieved, the temperature keeps on rising, which is around the middle of this Century.

snippet.textDisplay: I am glad there is company like National Geographic to educate the everyday person that does not not know what is going on in our world. The problems that we are facing are not spoken about enough and people are not educated enough on the topic to have a civil intelligent conversation. I would say one of the biggest problems in our world when talking about climate change is simply people do not know enough about the topic to have an intelligent conversation. I would also say there is so much misinformation being put out there by some groups that people are getting fooled on social media. I am glad there is a reliable source like National Geographic to give the public the information about climate change.

snippet.textDisplay: Fact, scientists know that at certain points in earths history CO2 was up to 1300% higher than today. Yet the earth cooled during this period. These are theories. Another fact, scientists were off on the agenda of dinosaurs by hundreds of millions of years. We also know that the Earth has gone through many climate changes. Long before humans. Clean the air, it might help cool the planet, despite no evidence of that. Better, clean the air because it's bad for our health. But don't be radical about something that's theoretical.

snippet.textDisplay:
To the administrators of National Geographic.

My name is Rollerz Pattinasarany. I live in Jakarta Indonesia.
I hereby request permission to use the video entitled "Causes and Effects of Climate Change" in activities at my church. This activity aims to make the congregation love the earth more as God's creation. I wish I could be allowed to use it.

I want to say thank you for your help. God bless National Geographic.
snippet.textOriginal:
To the administrators of National Geographic.

My name is Rollerz Pattinasarany. I live in Jakarta Indonesia.
I hereby request permission to use the video entitled "Causes and Effects of Climate Change" in activities at my church. This activity aims to make the congregation love the earth more as God's creation. I wish I could be allowed to use it.

I want to say thank you for your help. God bless National Geographic.

snippet.textDisplay: We have the prerequisites technologies to enable us build gravitation electric power stations for families globally. This is the technology which will help us get green hydrogen. For every tree which will not be cut for fire wood will help the global green ecosystem recovery.

snippet.textDisplay: Dear National Geographic, on behalf of the Department of Climate Change in Cambodia, we are really interested in the video and it provides information causes of climate change and its related impacts. As the video is good to enhance the public understanding, but it is in English, could you provide the original source of the video, or we be authorized to download and translate the video into our language, which is Khmer? You will be credited, and every content and visibility of your video will be maintained. We look to hearing from you.
snippet.textOriginal: Dear National Geographic, on behalf of the Department of Climate Change in Cambodia, we are really interested in the video and it provides information causes of climate change and its related impacts. As the video is good to enhance the public understanding, but it is in English, could you provide the original source of the video, or we be authorized to download and translate the video into our language, which is Khmer? You will be credited, and every content and visibility of your video will be maintained. We look to hearing from you.

snippet.textDisplay:
Around the world our Earth has to sit
With cars that cough cancer
On the sun-parched grit
Sand creeps from beaches
Concrete on the road
Under a debt
The buildings will corrode

Planes sail in and role down the earth
Dry as the wit
No plants it will birth
And out jump the flames to contend for the ground
Fire now no tool, our grip is unsound

So where will we rest as our tiredness grows?
Idealists, denialists. Nobody knows?
Well lets sink the trees in and get on the bus.
Offset the flights or forget them. No fuss!
Get out the bins and recycle, could you?
Put on your layers (and heat on renew)
Try out search engines that say they are planting
If it's false it stops Pichai gallivanting!
And do you need that pair of snazzy new trousers?
I doubt it! Just wear the old ones. They are wowzers!
snippet.textOriginal:
Around the world our Earth has to sit
With cars that cough cancer
On the sun-parched grit
Sand creeps from beaches
Concrete on the road
Under a debt 
The buildings will corrode

Planes sail in and role down the earth
Dry as the wit
No plants it will birth
And out jump the flames to contend for the ground
Fire now no tool, our grip is unsound

So where will we rest as our tiredness grows?
Idealists, denialists. Nobody knows?
Well lets sink the trees in and get on the bus.
Offset the flights or forget them. No fuss!
Get out the bins and recycle, could you?
Put on your layers (and heat on renew)
Try out search engines that say they are planting
If it's false it stops Pichai gallivanting!
And do you need that pair of snazzy new trousers?
I doubt it! Just wear the old ones. They are wowzers!
